docs.lead_paragraph: A NEAT little figure, a plain gown, the hair worn straight back from the face, almost with the rigid lines employed in the early sixties, the bonnet and the gown already mentioned being of mourning stuff -- this is Mrs. Lewis Rutherfurd, who is so soon to marry William K. Vanderbilt.
